title: Conspiracy to restrain trade quote - effect

content.description: “Every contract, combination in form of trust or otherwise, or conspiracy, in restraint of trade or commerce in any territory of the United States . . . is hereby declared illegal.”
content.question: The passage above was most effectively used for which purpose in the late nineteenth century?

choices.label: Supporting the goals of Social Darwinists
Restricting the power of monopolies and trusts
Limiting the power of labor unions
Regulating railroads and grain storage silos
Upholding the powers of the Interstate Commerce Act

content.answer: Limiting the power of labor unions
